extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     6.0 units from FREN212 or FREN220 or FREN221 and registration in a FREN Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN324; FREN424.

basic.description: A detailed study of selected novels from 20th-century French authors until 1945. Beauvoir, Camus, Céline, Cocteau, Colette, Gide, Proust, Sartre. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests. Given jointly with FREN 424/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le roman français du 20e siècle I
